fields.name: AvailabilitySets
fields.description: A list of references to all availability sets in the proximity placement group.

fields.name: ColocationStatus
fields.description: Describes colocation status of the Proximity Placement Group.

fields.name: ProximityPlacementGroupType
fields.description:
Specifies the type of the proximity placement group.

Possible values are:

**Standard** : Co-locate resources within an Azure region or Availability Zone.

**Ultra** : For future use.

fields.name: VirtualMachineScaleSets
fields.description: A list of references to all virtual machine scale sets in the proximity placement group.

fields.name: VirtualMachines
fields.description: A list of references to all virtual machines in the proximity placement group.
